commits.author: Ben Zohar
commits.message: Fixes to ExperienceActive experiences - Changed default behavior and handling of IsExperienceActive flag
commits.title: Experience Active State Management Update
commits.detailed_description: Significant refactoring of how store active states are managed. Changed the relationship between IsActive and IsExperienceActive flags to be more intuitive. Updated multiple components including state transitions, command handling, and event management.

file_changes.change_summary:
Removed automatic IsExperienceActive setting:
- Removed redundant IsExperienceActive property from request
- Removed comment about IsActive/IsExperienceActive relationship
- Simplified store activation logic
- Improved API contract

Updated IsExperienceActive handling in command:
- Changed IsExperienceActive to be nullable boolean
- Set to null when store is active, false when inactive
- Removed direct IsExperienceActive setting from command
- Improved state transition logic

Simplified command structure:
- Removed IsExperienceActive property
- Reduced command complexity
- Improved command clarity

Updated subscription event handling:
- Removed redundant IsExperienceActive setting
- Simplified store deactivation logic
- Updated command publishing

Made IsExperienceActive nullable:
- Changed IsExperienceActive to bool?
- Added support for null state
- Improved type safety

Changed default experience activation behavior:
- Set default IsExperienceActive to false for new stores
- Added null-safe handling of IsExperienceActive
- Added comment explaining manual unpause requirement
- Updated state application logic

Updated experience state query handling:
- Added conditional IsExperienceActive setting based on IsActive
- Improved null handling in query results
- Enhanced state reading logic

commits.detailed_description: Comprehensive update to the SDK's core functionality including enhanced tracking persistence, improved session storage handling, new tracking data validation, and improved type safety throughout the codebase.

- Enhanced tracking persistence
- Improved session storage handling
- Added new tracking validation
- Enhanced error handling
- Improved type safety
- Added performance optimizations

commits.author: Ben Zohar
commits.message: edgecase fix for first page ignoring first product.
commits.title: Edge Case Fix for First Page Product Handling
commits.detailed_description: Fixed a critical issue in the BulkVariantRepo where the first product on the first page was being ignored during query execution. This was affecting product listings and potentially impacting store performance. The fix ensures proper handling of all products, particularly the first item in paginated results.

file_changes.change_summary:
Fixed critical edge case in product pagination:
- Corrected first page product handling
- Improved query performance
- Added error handling
- Enhanced logging
- Added validation checks

commits.author: Cesar De Casas
commits.message: Only check allow customer donation if campaign is active
commits.title: Customer Donation Campaign Check Optimization
commits.detailed_description: Improved the logic for checking customer donation eligibility. Modified multiple components to ensure donation checks only occur for active campaigns. Enhanced widget initialization and campaign status handling.

file_changes.change_summary:
Optimized customer donation campaign checks:
- Added campaign activity validation
- Improved tracking initialization
- Enhanced error handling
- Added performance monitoring
- Improved state management
